Remarks: Baseline PromptSG identical logic to ViT?v1 (Linear + CE + Triplet, SupCon off, AdamW, grad?clip 5).

Introduced weight_decay 1e?4, LR warm?up + Cosine LR, SupCon enabled with temperature & loss?balance; "
           "early_stop_patience 5.
BNNeck + ArcFace head introduced (256?d) via build_promptsg_models; sharp performance drop.

TextualInversionMLP upgraded (3?layer + BN); refined multimodal fusion (1 cross + 2 self); "
           "composed prompt used; modest recovery.
Stability tweaks: grad?clip 1, lr_clip_visual and lr_modules 1e?6; BNNeck/ArcFace retained; "

Deeper FT & larger neck: unfreeze_blocks 4, bnneck_dim 1024; "
           "ArcFace scale 30 margin 0.35; lr_clip_visual/modules 1e?4; max_norm 0.5; Cosine scheduler removed  "
Configuration kept, but epochs 60 and patience 10
